entries.femaleVariant: Hello, Night City. This is Gillean Jordan with an N54 News campaign update. Exit polls for the Night City mayoral race have finally been tallied.
Incumbent Weldon Holt of the Devolutionist Party received 47.8 percent of the vote despite allegations of his complicity in the murder of Lucius Rhyne, former mayor of Night City.
But, in a close race, Federalist candidate Jefferson Peralez still seized the election with 49.3 percent of the vote.
In his concession speech, Mayor Holt offered his congratulations to the victor.
Now we see whether Peralez will be able to realize his ambitious campaign promises.
After the break â€“ When will the Corsairs end their losing streak?
